translations: 使分离，把……分开；与……撇清关系，表明无关

sentences.sentence: I wish to disassociate myself from this very sad decision.
sentences.translation: 我希望能撇清和这个令人遗憾的决定的联系。

sentences.sentence: The technologist will guide the patient to this modified state—an imaginary world that will disassociate itself more and more from the procedure that follows.
sentences.translation: 技术专家会引导病人进入这种改变的状态——一个想象中的世界，它会越来越脱离接下来的程序。

sentences.sentence: Accountants should also disassociate themselves from any attempts to disclose misleading information.
sentences.translation: 会计人员还应避免披露误导性信息。
